name: Respaid
long_description:
We recover up to 85,000 invoices per day and get 50% paid within 20 days on average.

Respaid uses AI to respectfully collect overdue B2B invoices. Just give us an excel fileâ€”no attached invoices needed. We integrate with your stack or work standalone, protecting your brand's reputation while maximizing collections through our AI-powered, respectful approach.
one_liner: Respectful B2B Debt Collection, Powered by AI
